mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu ( menu_name, menu_url, parent_id, menu_order, menu_type, removable, description, del_flag ) values ( #{menuName}, #{menuUrl}, #{parentId}, #{menuOrder}, #{menuType}, #{removable}, #{description}, #{del_flag} )
mapper.select: select menu_id menuId, menu_name menuName, menu_url menuUrl, parent_id parentId, menu_order menuOrder, menu_type menuType, removable, description, del_flag from sys_menu where del_flag != -1 and menu_id = #{menuId}
mapper.update: update sys_menu set menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_url = #{menuUrl}, menu_order = #{menuOrder}, removable = #{removable}, description = #{description} where menu_id = #{menuId}
update sys_menu set del_flag = -1 where 1=1 and removable=1 and menu_id = #{menuId}
